title: Top economist who previously sounded the alarm on tariffs sees a possible scenario where Trump ‘outsmarted all of us’
description: "This would seem like a victory for the world and yet would produce $400 billion of annual revenue for US taxpayers."
content: <ul><li>Torsten Sløk, chief economist at Apollo Global Management, laid out a potential scenario where President Donald Trump’s tariffs are extended long enough to ease economic uncertainty while als… [+3738 chars]
